15#ifndef DNS_CATZ_H
16#define DNS_CATZ_H 1
17
18#include <inttypes.h>
19#include <stdbool.h>
20
21#include <isc/ht.h>
22#include <isc/lang.h>
23#include <isc/refcount.h>
24#include <isc/rwlock.h>
25#include <isc/time.h>
26#include <isc/timer.h>
27
28#include <dns/db.h>
29#include <dns/fixedname.h>
30#include <dns/ipkeylist.h>
31#include <dns/rdata.h>
32#include <dns/types.h>
33
34ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
35
36#define DNS_CATZ_ERROR_LEVEL ISC_LOG_WARNING
37#define DNS_CATZ_INFO_LEVEL ISC_LOG_INFO
38#define DNS_CATZ_DEBUG_LEVEL1 ISC_LOG_DEBUG(1)
39#define DNS_CATZ_DEBUG_LEVEL2 ISC_LOG_DEBUG(2)
40#define DNS_CATZ_DEBUG_LEVEL3 ISC_LOG_DEBUG(3)
41#define DNS_CATZ_DEBUG_QUIET (DNS_CATZ_DEBUG_LEVEL3+1)
42
43/*
44 * Catalog Zones functions and structures.
45 */
46
47/*
48 * Options for a member zone in a catalog
49 */
50struct dns_catz_entry_options {
51 /*
52 * Options that can be overriden in catalog zone
53 */
54 /* default-masters definition */
55 dns_ipkeylist_t masters;
56
57 /* both as text in config format, NULL if none */
58 isc_buffer_t *allow_query;
59 isc_buffer_t *allow_transfer;
60
61 /*
62 * Options that are only set in named.conf
63 */
64 /* zone-directory definition */
65 char *zonedir;
66
67 /* zone should not be stored on disk (no 'file' statement in def */
68 bool in_memory;
69 /*
70 * Minimal interval between catalog zone updates, if a new version
71 * of catalog zone is received before this time the update will be
72 * postponed. This is a global option for the whole catalog zone.
73 */
74 uint32_t min_update_interval;
75};
76
77void
78dns_catz_options_init(dns_catz_options_t *options);
79/*%<
80 * Initialize 'options' to NULL values.
81 *
82 * Requires:
83 * \li 'options' to be non NULL.
84 */
85
86void
87dns_catz_options_free(dns_catz_options_t *options, isc_mem_t *mctx);
88/*%<
89 * Free 'options' contents into 'mctx'. ('options' itself is not freed.)
90 *
91 * Requires:
92 * \li 'options' to be non NULL.
93 * \li 'mctx' to be a valid memory context.
94 */
95
96isc_result_t
97dns_catz_options_copy(isc_mem_t *mctx, const dns_catz_options_t *opts,
98 dns_catz_options_t *nopts);
99/*%<
100 * Duplicate 'opts' into 'nopts', allocating space from 'mctx'.
101 *
102 * Requires:
103 * \li 'mctx' to be a valid memory context.
104 * \li 'options' to be non NULL and valid options.
105 * \li 'nopts' to be non NULL.
106 */
107
108isc_result_t
109dns_catz_options_setdefault(isc_mem_t *mctx, const dns_catz_options_t *defaults,
110 dns_catz_options_t *opts);
111/*%<
112 * Replace empty values in 'opts' with values from 'defaults'
113 *
114 * Requires:
115 * \li 'mctx' to be a valid memory context.
116 * \li 'defaults' to be non NULL and valid options.
117 * \li 'opts' to be non NULL.
118 */
119
120dns_name_t *
121dns_catz_entry_getname(dns_catz_entry_t *entry);
122/*%<
123 * Get domain name for 'entry'
124 *
125 * Requires:
126 * \li 'entry' to be non NULL.
127 *
128 * Returns:
129 * \li domain name for entry.
130 */
131
132isc_result_t
133dns_catz_entry_new(isc_mem_t *mctx, const dns_name_t *domain,
134 dns_catz_entry_t **nentryp);
135/*%<
136 * Allocate a new catz_entry on 'mctx', with the name 'domain'
137 *
138 * Requires:
139 * \li 'mctx' to be a valid memory context.
140 * \li 'domain' to be valid dns_name or NULL.
141 * \li 'nentryp' to be non NULL, *nentryp to be NULL.
142 *
143 * Returns:
144 * \li ISC_R_SUCCESS on success
145 * \li ISC_R_NOMEMORY on allocation failure
146 */
147
148isc_result_t
149dns_catz_entry_copy(dns_catz_zone_t *zone, const dns_catz_entry_t *entry,
150 dns_catz_entry_t **nentryp);
151/*%<
152 * Allocate a new catz_entry and deep copy 'entry' into 'nentryp'.
153 *
154 * Requires:
155 * \li 'mctx' to be a valid memory context.
156 * \li 'entry' to be non NULL.
157 * \li 'nentryp' to be non NULL, *nentryp to be NULL.
158 *
159 * Returns:
160 * \li ISC_R_SUCCESS on success
161 * \li ISC_R_NOMEMORY on allocation failure
162 */
163
164void
165dns_catz_entry_attach(dns_catz_entry_t *entry, dns_catz_entry_t **entryp);
166/*%<
167 * Attach an entry
168 *
169 * Requires:
170 * \li 'entry' is a valid dns_catz_entry_t.
171 * \li 'entryp' is not NULL and '*entryp' is NULL.
172 */
173
174void
175dns_catz_entry_detach(dns_catz_zone_t *zone, dns_catz_entry_t **entryp);
176/*%<
177 * Detach an entry, free if no further references
178 *
179 * Requires:
180 * \li 'zone' is a valid dns_catz_zone_t.
181 * \li 'entryp' is not NULL and '*entryp' is not NULL.
182 */
183
184bool
185dns_catz_entry_validate(const dns_catz_entry_t *entry);
186/*%<
187 * Validate whether entry is correct.
188 * (NOT YET IMPLEMENTED: always returns true)
189 *
190 * Requires:
191 *\li 'entry' is a valid dns_catz_entry_t.
192 */
193
194bool
195dns_catz_entry_cmp(const dns_catz_entry_t *ea, const dns_catz_entry_t *eb);
196/*%<
197 * Deep compare two entries
198 *
199 * Requires:
200 * \li 'ea' is a valid dns_catz_entry_t.
201 * \li 'eb' is a valid dns_catz_entry_t.
202 *
203 * Returns:
204 * \li 'true' if entries are the same.
205 * \li 'false' if the entries differ.
206 */
207
208void
209dns_catz_zone_attach(dns_catz_zone_t *zone, dns_catz_zone_t **zonep);
210/*%<
211 * Attach a catzone
212 *
213 * Requires:
214 * \li 'zone' is a valid dns_catz_zone_t.
215 * \li 'zonep' is not NULL and '*zonep' is NULL.
216 */
217
218void
219dns_catz_zone_detach(dns_catz_zone_t** zonep);
220/*%<
221 * Detach a zone, free if no further references
222 *
223 * Requires:
224 * \li 'zonep' is not NULL and '*zonep' is not NULL.
225 */
226
227isc_result_t
228dns_catz_new_zone(dns_catz_zones_t *catzs, dns_catz_zone_t **zonep,
229 const dns_name_t *name);
230/*%<
231 * Allocate a new catz zone on catzs mctx
232 *
233 * Requires:
234 * \li 'catzs' is a valid dns_catz_zones_t.
235 * \li 'zonep' is not NULL and '*zonep' is NULL.
236 * \li 'name' is a valid dns_name_t.
237 *
238 */
239
240dns_name_t *
241dns_catz_zone_getname(dns_catz_zone_t *zone);
242/*%<
243 * Get catalog zone name
244 *
245 * Requires:
246 * \li 'zone' is a valid dns_catz_zone_t.
247 */
248
249dns_catz_options_t *
250dns_catz_zone_getdefoptions(dns_catz_zone_t *zone);
251/*%<
252 * Get default member zone options for catalog zone 'zone'
253 *
254 * Requires:
255 * \li 'zone' is a valid dns_catz_zone_t.
256 */
257
258void
259dns_catz_zone_resetdefoptions(dns_catz_zone_t *zone);
260/*%<
261 * Reset the default member zone options for catalog zone 'zone' to
262 * the default values.
263 *
264 * Requires:
265 * \li 'zone' is a valid dns_catz_zone_t.
266 */
267
268isc_result_t
269dns_catz_zones_merge(dns_catz_zone_t *target, dns_catz_zone_t *newzone);
270/*%<
271 * Merge 'newzone' into 'target', calling addzone/delzone/modzone
272 * (from zone->catzs->zmm) for appropriate member zones.
273 *
274 * Requires:
275 * \li 'orig' is a valid dns_catz_zone_t.
276 * \li 'newzone' is not NULL and '*newzone' is not NULL.
277 *
278 */
279
280isc_result_t
281dns_catz_update_process(dns_catz_zones_t *catzs, dns_catz_zone_t *zone,
282 const dns_name_t *src_name, dns_rdataset_t *rdataset);
283/*%<
284 * Process a single rdataset from a catalog zone 'zone' update, src_name is the
285 * record name.
286 *
287 * Requires:
288 * \li 'catzs' is a valid dns_catz_zones_t.
289 * \li 'zone' is a valid dns_catz_zone_t.
290 * \li 'src_name' is a valid dns_name_t.
291 * \li 'rdataset' is valid rdataset.
292 */
293
294isc_result_t
295dns_catz_generate_masterfilename(dns_catz_zone_t *zone, dns_catz_entry_t *entry,
296 isc_buffer_t **buffer);
297/*%<
298 * Generate master file name and put it into *buffer (might be reallocated).
299 * The general format of the file name is:
300 * __catz__catalog.zone.name__member_zone_name.db
301 * But if it's too long it's shortened to:
302 * __catz__unique_hash_generated_from_the_above.db
303 *
304 * Requires:
305 * \li 'zone' is a valid dns_catz_zone_t.
306 * \li 'entry' is a valid dns_catz_entry_t.
307 * \li 'buffer' is not NULL and '*buffer' is not NULL.
308 */
309
310isc_result_t
311dns_catz_generate_zonecfg(dns_catz_zone_t *zone, dns_catz_entry_t *entry,
312 isc_buffer_t **buf);
313/*%<
314 * Generate a zone config entry (in text form) from dns_catz_entry and puts
315 * it into *buf. buf might be reallocated.
316 *
317 * Requires:
318 * \li 'zone' is a valid dns_catz_zone_t.
319 * \li 'entry' is a valid dns_catz_entry_t.
320 * \li 'buf' is not NULL and '*buf' is NULL.
321 *
322 */
323
324
325/* Methods provided by named to dynamically modify the member zones */
326/* xxxwpk TODO config! */
327typedef isc_result_t (*dns_catz_zoneop_fn_t)(dns_catz_entry_t *entry,
328 dns_catz_zone_t *origin, dns_view_t *view,
329 isc_taskmgr_t *taskmgr, void *udata);
330struct dns_catz_zonemodmethods {
331 dns_catz_zoneop_fn_t addzone;
332 dns_catz_zoneop_fn_t modzone;
333 dns_catz_zoneop_fn_t delzone;
334 void * udata;
335};
336
337
338isc_result_t
339dns_catz_new_zones(dns_catz_zones_t **catzsp, dns_catz_zonemodmethods_t *zmm,
340 isc_mem_t *mctx, isc_taskmgr_t *taskmgr,
341 isc_timermgr_t *timermgr);
342/*%<
343 * Allocate a new catz_zones object, a collection storing all catalog zones
344 * for a view.
345 *
346 * Requires:
347 * \li 'catzsp' is not NULL and '*catzsp' is NULL.
348 * \li 'zmm' is not NULL.
349 *
350 */
351
352isc_result_t
353dns_catz_add_zone(dns_catz_zones_t *catzs, const dns_name_t *name,
354 dns_catz_zone_t **catzp);
355/*%<
356 * Allocate a new catz named 'name' and put it in 'catzs' collection.
357 *
358 * Requires:
359 * \li 'catzs' is a valid dns_catz_zones_t.
360 * \li 'name' is a valid dns_name_t.
361 * \li 'zonep' is not NULL and *zonep is NULL.
362 *
363 */
364
365dns_catz_zone_t *
366dns_catz_get_zone(dns_catz_zones_t *catzs, const dns_name_t *name);
367/*%<
368 * Returns a zone named 'name' from collection 'catzs'
369 *
370 * Requires:
371 * \li 'catzs' is a valid dns_catz_zones_t.
372 * \li 'name' is a valid dns_name_t.
373 */
374
375void
376dns_catz_catzs_attach(dns_catz_zones_t *catzs, dns_catz_zones_t **catzsp);
377/*%<
378 * Attach 'catzs' to 'catzsp'.
379 *
380 * Requires:
381 * \li 'catzs' is a valid dns_catz_zones_t.
382 * \li 'catzsp' is not NULL and *catzsp is NULL.
383 */
384
385void
386dns_catz_catzs_detach(dns_catz_zones_t **catzsp);
387/*%<
388 * Detach 'catzsp', free if no further references.
389 *
390 * Requires:
391 * \li 'catzsp' is not NULL and *catzsp is not NULL.
392 */
393
394void
395dns_catz_catzs_set_view(dns_catz_zones_t *catzs, dns_view_t *view);
396/*%<
397 * Set a view for 'catzs'.
398 *
399 * Requires:
400 * \li 'catzs' is a valid dns_catz_zones_t.
401 * \li 'catzs->view' is NULL or 'catzs->view' == 'view'.
402 */
403
404
405isc_result_t
406dns_catz_dbupdate_callback(dns_db_t *db, void *fn_arg);
407/*%<
408 * Callback for update of catalog zone database.
409 * If there was no catalog zone update recently it launches an
410 * update_taskaction immediately.
411 * If there was an update recently it schedules update_taskaction for some time
412 * in the future.
413 * If there is an update scheduled it replaces old db version with a new one.
414 *
415 * Requires:
416 * \li 'db' is a valid database.
417 * \li 'fn_arg' is not NULL (casted to dns_catz_zones_t*).
418 */
419
420void
421dns_catz_update_taskaction(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event);
422/*%<
423 * Task that launches dns_catz_update_from_db.
424 *
425 * Requires:
426 * \li 'event' is not NULL.
427 */
428
429void
430dns_catz_update_from_db(dns_db_t *db, dns_catz_zones_t *catzs);
431/*%<
432 * Process an updated database for a catalog zone.
433 * It creates a new catz, iterates over database to fill it with content, and
434 * then merges new catz into old catz.
435 *
436 * Requires:
437 * \li 'db' is a valid DB.
438 * \li 'catzs' is a valid dns_catz_zones_t.
439 *
440 */
441
442void
443dns_catz_prereconfig(dns_catz_zones_t *catzs);
444/*%<
445 * Called before reconfig, clears 'active' flag on all the zones in set
446 *
447 * Requires:
448 * \li 'catzs' is a valid dns_catz_zones_t.
449 *
450 */
451
452void
453dns_catz_postreconfig(dns_catz_zones_t *catzs);
454/*%<
455 * Called after reconfig, walks through all zones in set, removes those
456 * inactive and force reload of those with changed configuration.
457 *
458 * Requires:
459 * \li 'catzs' is a valid dns_catz_zones_t.
460 */
461
462isc_result_t
463dns_catz_get_iterator(dns_catz_zone_t *catz, isc_ht_iter_t **itp);
464/*%<
465 * Get the hashtable iterator on catalog zone members, point '*itp' to it.
466 *
467 * Requires:
468 * \li 'catzs' is a valid dns_catz_zones_t.
469 * \li 'itp' is not NULL and '*itp' is NULL.
470 *
471 * Returns:
472 * \li #ISC_R_SUCCESS -- success
473 * \li Any other value -- failure
474 */
475
476ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
477
478#endif /* DNS_CATZ_H_ */
